channel.title: Moonhowl, a werewolf-esque game [Night 1]
channel.description:
# Gameplay Everyone will be given a public role, and a secret identity, your secret identity is either "Human" or "Werewolf" There are 2 phases, Day Phase and Night Phase
# Day Phase During the day phase, players may talk, and perform actions around the town, all of these actions are public knowledge
# Night Phase During the night phase, players perform secret actions
# Town Locations Only 1 player may visit each location per day and perform the associated action, unless stated otherwise Town Hall - A player who visits the Town Hall may call a vote, votes can be for many different things, the votes are publicly voted on, you can't vote for things that don't affect the game or things that don't make sense Gallows(2 players) - A player who visits the Gallows may speak privately with any other players who visit the gallows today Church - A player who visits the church may pray, confess, or steal silver, praying protects you from werewolves tonight, confession reveals the last place you visited secretly to the priest, stealing silver can only be done twice per game, but you get silver Market - A player who visits the market may purchase meat Blacksmith - A player who visits the blacksmith may receive a weapon, or have their silver turned into a silver bullet Infirmary - A player who visits the infirmary will not die today Morgue - A player who visits the morgue will learn about those who died recently Witches Hut - A player who visits the Witches Hut will learn about Werewolves, if a player learns 3 things about werewolves, they gain the ability to create a cure for lycanthropy at the infirmary
# Night Actions Any number of people can visit any location at night, as it is done secretly, however, you cannot visit Town Hall, the Market or the Blacksmith, you also cannot pray at the church
At night, all werewolves must choose a person to kill or a location to attack, if they attack a location, all visitors to that location will die, except those that prayed, you may also choose to bite a person, transforming them into a werewolf the following night
At night, if you have a weapon you may attack a person and make them bleed, if they do not get help the following day they will die
At night, if you have a silver bullet(and weapon) or cure for lycanthropy, you can use it on a player, if they are a werewolf the bullet will kill them and the cure will make them human
At night, if you have meat, you can keep it or place it in a location, if you keep it you are protected from werewolf attacks, if you place it somewhere that location is protected from werewolf attacks
# Winning Humans win if there are no werewolves
Werewolves win if there are only werewolves
# Roles Mayor - You have two votes when it comes to votes called by Town Hall Priest - You hear all confessions Monk - You can pray or confess even if there is someone at the church Apothecary - You can heal a player during the day without them needing to visit the infirmary Tanner - You can visit the Market even if there is someone there Ironmonger - You can visit the Blacksmith even if there is someone there Executioner - You start with a weapon, once per game you can kill a player during the daytime Hunter - You start with a weapon and 2 silver bullets Elder - You cannot be a werewolf, you will die at the end of Day 3 Leper - You cannot be killed by the werewolves unless you are the only player at the location they attack Witch - You can visit the witches hut even if there is someone there Coroner - You can visit the morgue even if there is someone there Thief - You can take items from people or the morgue
# Phase Lengths - 48 Hours Each
# Players (The game will start with 2 werewolves and 11 humans) 1. Simon - Leper 2. Ashe - Coroner 3. Marluxion - Mayor 4. Moleland - Executioner 5. Wolfy - Witch 6. PokemonKidRyan - Tanner 7. Frostwolf103 - Elder 8. Hippolytus - Monk 9. Rogue - Ironmonger 10. NucelarBurrito - Thief 11. Strangle - Apothecary 12. Insanity - Hunter 13. Methnor - Priest

PKR jumped on Mole’s suggestion to vig him like hot cakes.

item.description:
The mayor may be a wolf.
It’d also be a bigger threat if they were.
They have meat to keep for themselves, guaranteeing that most places aren’t protected.
Also they can double vote on things to help wolves in this game.
So, I’d approve of that @Moleland

Read full topic
